Title: High Water and a Devil's Daughter
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Celeste Vasquez, Carina Adly MacKenzie, Carina Adly MacKenzie (executive story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: When it's discovered that The Hollow's latest servant is on the loose, Freya places a protection spell on the compound, forcing Klaus, Hayley and Hope to remain inside. Meanwhile Elijah takes matters into his own hands.
